mapper.select: select * from user where username like concat('%',#{s,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or identity like concat('%',#{s,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or description like concat('%',#{s,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or coreBusiness like concat('%',#{s,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or assessment like concat('%',#{s,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%');

select * from user u where u.userid in (select senderId from input_transaction inp where inp.bpId=#{businessProcessId}) or u.userid in (select receiverId from input_transaction inp where inp.bpId=#{businessProcessId});
mapper.insert: insert into private_user ( username, password, identity, description, coreBusiness, assessment) values ( #{username}, #{password}, #{identity}, #{description}, #{coreBusiness}, #{assessment})
